t: Maximizing Your Brand's Potential on Amazon: Brand Registry Benefits – Marketing by Emma
s: One of the most valuable benefits of Amazon Brand Registry is access to A+ Content, formerly known as Enhanced Brand Content. A+ Content allows brands to upgrade product pages on Amazon with immersive and engaging imagery, videos, charts, and custom text.
